title: Natural Capital Project
cleaned_text: The Natural Capital Project aims to improve the well-being of people and our planet by motivating targeted investments in nature. Food Forests: Growing Community Benefits The Natural Capital Project presents a report, in collaboration with the Food Policy Council of San Antonio and three San Antonio city departments, that estimates the amount of food that could be produced by urban farms and food forests, as well as other additional benefits, in San Antonio, Texas. [Read more](/node/22063) We equip decison-makers with the tools and information to make policies and investments that empower green growth. Learn more about how our work spans from research to impact in this short video.
